attributes.action:
GET HAIRSTYLISTS BACK TO WORK!

We wear FULL PPE, WE ARE ESSENTIAL & A TRADE!
attributes.additional_details:
It’s our busiest time of year, our books are full, our shelves stocked and our salons have already passed the COVID 19 safety checks- WE WEAR MORE PPE THAN NURSES! We as an industry and trade shouldn’t be overlooked - we are mainly to the side and behind our guests. Rarely in front. We have Adhered to all guild lines and we are safe and majority are self employed.. 
Save out industry and put us back to work for our people’s well being and mental health
attributes.background:
Hairstylists are essential to people’s self care, mental health and general well being. 
A billion pound industry that is also a recognised trade.. 

We wear full PPE visors , masks , aprons , gloves , we sanitise have screens up and we have taken a huge hit .. we need to be open!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not require salons to close due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

Keep the beauty industry open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554478
